Package presentation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    I should have splitted the display class in 3 sepparate classes GeneralDisplay, AdminDisplay and CustomerDisplay but i figured this out only after 70% of my program was already done.That way it would have been not so long.Not modifying it would take to much time with no actual benefit for the application itself.
    Router
    Router class is used along with display to switch screens.
    ViewModel
    The purpose of this class is to enable easy access to a selected user.Once a user is selected from the inputed list we can easely access it in Display ,Service and Router with this class in order to perform operations on it.
